commits.author: Aurynn Shaw
commits.summary: Adds heredoc. Fixes snippet indentation style. Line comments match # as punctuation. comment blocks have punctuation scopes for start/end. Rename most scope selectors. Adds support for hexadecimal numbers, kKmMgG suffixes, and fixes interpolation escaping
